website_summaries.verdict: A trusted sneaker style that is a great pick for neutral runners.
pros: A good choice for women with narrow feet and high arches
Great for all types of exercise
cons: Not great for women with wider feet
Some complaints that this version isn't designed as thoughtfully as prior iterations

customer_reviews.title: This Is It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a serious runner. Qualified for the Boston Marathon three times and ran that beast this past April in what was their worst weather conditions in their history. I love my Mizuno Wave Rider 22! Let me tell ya, this pair is awesome! I run long and hard and these shoes are made for running! Get some!
customer_reviews.author: NSW

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for HIIT workout
customer_reviews.text: I went through 8 different shoes/returns until I found these shoes. I do Orangetheory avidly and it was really difficult for me to find a shoe for rowing/running/lifting! I am happy to say this one was the ticket. I love the look too! I will say, I bought these shoes, and inserts because I have tender feet and a high arch. I ended up returning the inserts because the shoe itself had all the cushion I needed.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: This W/D is regular Medium size
customer_reviews.text: Listed as one of the best cushioned running shoes. 1/2 to 1 size smaller. The cushion is very comfortable, everything is soft and just right. The shape of the shoes also. Near perfect for my feer if my feet were not wide. Choose W, the label was D. This W/ D is just like M.
customer_reviews.author: Get the Best

customer_reviews.title: Rubs on side of foot
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Wave Riders for probably 12 years. This model 22 is not good. The white Mizuno roadrunner logo on outer shoe is way too stiff. I think what has happened is the logo is slightly more toward the toe box and therefore hits my foot at the outer little toe. Will have to return them. Way too much blister potential. Plus it actually hurts! Not comfortable at all. Sadness.
customer_reviews.author: Jwebb

customer_reviews.title: D is NOT wide
customer_reviews.text: Nice support, BUT i have wide & bunion feet & the D (wide), is NOT that wide. I wear 9.5, but even that was a bit snug. I like Mizunos, but like Hokas, they run narrow!!
customer_reviews.author: Rewa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: I just love the wave rider! This is my 4th shoe in the wave rider. I started with the wave rider 19 and was blown away by how much it changed my running, injuries I had and overall comfort for my joints. (I have "flat feet".) The 22 is just as exceptional as the first one I bought. Comfort continues to get nothing but better and I'm loving the look.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be knock offs and not the real Mizuno wave riders that I have purchase from a local store. No wonder the CHEAP price. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Eggert

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Waverunners. I love them. I have a narrow foot with a high arch & these shoes hug my foot & give sufficient support. I’d recommend stepping up 1/2 a size as they run slightly small. I’m not a runner, but I do a lot of walking & cross training. And they’re perfect for that. I’m also glad they came in all black. For many years they only came in bright colors that weren’t to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: A Sweet Ride
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. no break-in period 2. great cushioning and support 3. can be worn with or without socks, depending on your activity Cons 1. my right toe rubs up on the upper, but not enough to be uncomfortable 2. due to above, this shoe runs a half size smaller Recommendation: I'm not an avid runner, so this shoe works well for both power walking and running. The color is conservative and fits that lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Langguth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe perfect fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: Wife very very happy with these shoes.. This is her 2nd pair.. She wore them to Disneyland to break in.. infact we brought another "worn in "pair of shoes to switch into if needed,, She never wore her other shoes.. From the box to her feet and that day we walked 7.2 miles and 17920 steps.. Shoes are comfortable well made, nice color, and great fit !!! Wife vey happy and you will be too.. Theme Park tested amd approved
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, But . . .
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Wave Rider for years and loved the fit -- was perfect for my arch. Apparently some changes have been made, and the 22's don't seem to have the same fit as my old 18's. Appears they decreased the arch height, which also causes my left foot to move around too much in the shoe. I've compensated by tying it a little tighter. I was just a bit disappointed because my previous 3 pairs (back to 12) had fit so perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, great fit, great support
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how many different and confusing choices there are in Mizuno running shoes. I bought the wrong model and tried to wear them into comfortable. They just got worse. So I looked carefully at the number, "Waverider 22." Luckily they are still making them and I was able to order a pair in the gorgeous purple. I wore them all through our trip to Vienna. They were great and looked very chic with all the black clothes I brought to wear. I implore Mizuno to keep making the model I am so sick of athletic shoe companies dropping models of sneakers and sandals.
customer_reviews.author: ggcc editor

customer_reviews.title: Small fit, order up!
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but are so small! I usually wear a 10.5 and these are so tight I don't think an 11 will even fit. Very disappointed because the black looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: KShahan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped the Wave Rider 22s would be like the 21s (because I love, love, love them), but they're not. The band/seam between the top of the laces and the bottom of the toe-box is too tight and, quite frankly, painful. I returned them the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mair

customer_reviews.title: Changes That Do Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: They changed the toe box. It’s too narrow for me now. I tried to size up but then the piece on the side was too tight and rubbed my foot. I hope the next version is better because I loved this shoe before.
customer_reviews.author: Misty B

customer_reviews.title: Longish distance supinator with high arches
customer_reviews.text: I am one of the select few with high arches that also supinates (roles on the outside of my feet). I have had these shows for 3 weeks and been on two longish runs (9-10 miles each) and several shortish 4 miles. So far my feet love me and it feels like I am running on a cloud. I will update as I get more miles under my belt. One frustration I typically have is that the tread on the outside wears out well before the life of the shoe should. I am hoping these treat me better!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy marie

customer_reviews.title: Quality sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Although these aren't quite as cushioning and light as the previous mizuno wave prophecy sneakers i purchased, they are still a quality, comfortable shoe. The only downside is the large open space in the heal of the sole which is welcoming to rocks that are part of all landscapes in Arizona. So, often I have to pull one out that gets stuck. I wish i could afford the 220. top of the line mizuno- they really are the best. But for a 100.00 this is a quality shoe that will do the trick if you require cushion for high arches and plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: 8th pair!  Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8th pair of Mizuno Wave Riders! I won't wear anything else for running. Great fit. Can easily run multiple miles in these shoes on day of purchase. Don't need to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe Comfortable and good cushioning and fits wider foot well which I appreciate
customer_reviews.author: Karen N

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The support inside and outside is great. Yet, these are lightweight and breathe. My left shoe fits like a glove in the 11 Wide. My right foot is bigger and is a tiny bit more snug, but I still think I picked the right size. I am planning on doing a half marathon in May and have to prepare to train. My feet feel great in these shoes. The reviews that people sent helped me choose these. Several people who do marathons said they loved these shoes. I see why. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had worn out a previous model of the Wave Rider that I really liked. There weren't any to be had in town so I took a chance and ordered a pair. I ordered the violet and liked them so ordered another pair in black. They are lightweight, comfortable, true to size and I would obviously order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but still love older models.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a several of these same shoes in other models. I loved the 15, not the 17 and 18's. These have changed and better then the past few models. I wish loved the harder souls rather than the cushioned ones. They seem more durable and are more comfortable for my supination.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Fastest time first try out of the box
customer_reviews.text: So maybe one 5k in the shoes, right out of the box isn't enough time to tell, but...they were amazing. My right foot runs a little bigger than my left...I thought for a moment about returning for a 7 instead of 6.5 but then I knew it would be too big on my left. I decided to give it a try. I have trouble with plantar fasciitis and heel Spurs,but my feet did not hurt one bit. As a matter of fact, had my fastest time. Coincidence? I think not.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robbins

customer_reviews.title: They were ok
customer_reviews.text: These were ok, but did not feel like quality material. I was trying to replace my favorite brand with these. Love the colors, which my favorite brand has the most dead boring colors. I loved the color choices. The comfort was not there for me. Not a flexible material. Not much padding. These are my choice for color not comfort. I ordered a 1/2 size larger than normal, it kinda rubbed spots. I am diabetic, so I am very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe for someone with a high arch.
customer_reviews.text: I have been running in Mizuno shoes for years. I was recommended Mizuno's by a specialty running store and have been buying them for years. I won't run in anything else. Great quality shoe with a supportive, high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Dls blonde girl

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet fall asleep.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand several times in the past, yet this shoe makes my feet fall asleep. Can't use them for running. :( Someone else who had the same shoe also has the same problem. Is the tongue too thick? I even tried different lacing techniques. It's weird.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaya Larsen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes. Lightweight, well-balanced, great support, and very attractive (love the colors.) Exactly what I wanted! I don't run, but like running shoes because they are not heavy like walking shoes. This is my 1st purchase of Mizuno, will probably not be my last.
customer_reviews.author: My humble opinion

customer_reviews.title: Narrower toe than before.
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet 12 hour shifts, and have loved the support of Mizuno Wave Rider 15, however, this newer version crowded and reddened my outer toes and just plain hurt after only 4 hours. These are 11's and fit more like a 10. A co-worker admired the look of them, I gave them to her, she wears a 9 1/2 and she says they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I ever had
customer_reviews.text: They are light, fit perfectly, and are so comfortable for running! I feel that I can eve run longer with them! After half a year, they are as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great heel cushioning but terrible ankle support. If u r looking for both I recommend the Mizuno Wave inspire not these. I bought them for gym but not the ideal shoes for gym. They are comfortable far as cushioning in shoes that's about the only positive thing I like about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA

customer_reviews.title: Just What My Doctor Ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have supinated feet with extremely high arches. These give me all relief and work well with all my different fitness activities! Best shoes for me!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Croft

customer_reviews.title: Like the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Like the slight stretch in the laces too. Glad I ordered the wide- needed it. I did skip the first lacing hole due to my wide bunion feet. Have done this with other running shoes too- helps it fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as always
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. The pair I ordered had a defect in the seem on the left shoe so I returned them and bought the same shoe again elsewhere. Feel great no puckered seem.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Landsberg

customer_reviews.title: Support, comfort, cute color
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Very comfortable and supportive. I walk 2-3 miles a day in them. My only issue is that the space in the middle of the heel is the perfect size to trap sweetgum balls. It’s a Southern thang!
customer_reviews.author: Jillcat

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Decided to start running again and get back to mizunos. These are very lightweight, comfortable and the gray color with blue looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I always order this kind of running shoe. They last a long time and are great for arch support. I have flat feet and refuse to buy any other brand than mizuno. I’ve tried others and ended up with hip issues. The price is well worth the use you get out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Greer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting walking shoe I’ve ever owned even better then my Hokas
customer_reviews.author: B Joystock

customer_reviews.title: Tight toe box but good stability
customer_reviews.text: This is usually my brand with zero problems right out of the box, but this pair is unusually tight in the toe box, causing some toe pain on longer runs. It may just be a bad pair-I love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanimal

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: I've used Wave Riders for the past decade, and this pair, specifically the right shoe, just isn't quite right. It took a few runs to figure it out, but it's a little too small and the fit causes my arch to ache and spasm. I've never had this issue before so I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Swissmiss

customer_reviews.title: Sized at least 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to fit so badly. They are narrow and short, so I ordered a full size up. The size was okay but the shoes felt a little stiff and not a lot of cushion. Sadly, I had to return these. They did not work for me but I'm sure many people would love these.
customer_reviews.author: zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: For a wide width, they are very snug.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wide width, but they are very snug; not as comfortable as compared to other wide width athletic shoes I’ve purchased in the past. However, they have good support and great cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Suitable for most foot types
customer_reviews.text: I run every day and these shoes have quality and durable materials that last an entire year! These shoes fit well and I DON'T have to order a "wide" even though I have a bit of a wider foot. Also, it took about 3 weeks to a month to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around - excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as expected, the comfort is exceptional, the running feel is sturdy and balanced, and the walking feel is comfortable. Everything is excellent, and it looks truly incredible.
customer_reviews.author: AMH3

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable running shoe for trail and pavement
customer_reviews.text: I had a good experience with Mizuno wave rider but I was concerned about the grip for wet surfaces as my previous Mizuno Wave Rider were not very good in wet surfaces but this model has good grip and it's better than the previous model. These days a 90% of my runs are trail and I am very pleased with this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: AsharAV

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe for a while and just love it. I am very sad that Mizuno has discontinued this version of their running shoe line.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the 19 model. Fits similar to those. I feel Mizuno always runs a bit small so I order Up about a half size. Very comfortable in my opinion. I know They are running shoes but I wear them at work as a nurse for 12+ hours
customer_reviews.author: RAL WAL

customer_reviews.title: Great for running with bunions!!
customer_reviews.text: Like running on clouds! These shoes have been great while working out and running! They don’t hurt my bunion issues which is why I bought this style after googling which shoe is best for bunions. I sized up a full size and they’re perfect! Will plan to buy again after these wear down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno’s are great
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite running shoe, but since this one also comes in black, I can wear it to work with my uniform as well. It doubles as both a running shoe and work shoe for me, and it’s great for both.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. I had to wear these right out of the box for a 12 mile run. They were comfortable and kept up with me. I didn’t even get any blisters! These are my 3rd pair of Mizunos and I will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Gotten several shoes from this seller Fast shipping, great prices, lots of colors to choose from
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: great shoes & prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Mizuno wave riders. Obviously, I love this running shoe but buying them new can be really expensive. Found a new pair of an older edition that were ~$40 cheaper than buying the newest edition; arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Will buy from vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is fairly similar to my old Wave Riders. The cushioning is a little softer but still has the responsive feel that I really liked with the old models. The heel is a little thicker than in past models too, but it doesn't seem to be too cumbersome. Overall, they feel great, and I'm really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For High Arches
customer_reviews.text: When I ran my first marathon, the store I went to specialized in running shoes. They fitted me with the Mizuno Wave Rider. I've been hooked ever since. There are a LOT of amazing shoe brands, and I've tried to buy beyond Mizuno over the years, but for my feet, with high arches, this shoe gives the best overall support.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. I have flat feet and supinate, but I like to run. I need good arch support and heel support. These shoes are incredible
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur the Cardi

customer_reviews.title: Love my Mizunos!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a longtime Mizuno wearer. These shoes fit my somewhat wide foot well, have good cushioning, not too clunky.
customer_reviews.author: LSU Lady

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They were just ok. I’ve ran in the same style but was the men’s and for some reason the women’s aren’t near as cushy. I was a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and feel good even at the end of a 13 hour work day. They are not to hot or cold, and have just the right amount of cushioning. I love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Muddygirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, good neutral shoe for on trail or road. This is probably my fifth or sixth pair of the wave rider line, I've run races and every day in them.
customer_reviews.author: crocodile

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good. Good support. Looks good. Laces tie well, even with the extended loop at the top. I mainly do weights in a gym, not much running. Have not used them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great support, plenty of space in the toe box, no break in time necessary.
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, second pair of wave runners. Perfect for supination.
customer_reviews.author: thatmanphil

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe and everyday shoe. I’m a medical professional, I’m on my feet all day. I have one pair for running and one pair for work. Super comfy, great support!!
customer_reviews.author: Gena Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Love Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: Love Mizuno! Measured foot, read fitting chart, no problems with size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Broaddrick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste time
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy about these shoes. They are heavy when running - went back to my ASICS nimbus!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: flexible and supporitve
customer_reviews.text: i have been running in Mizunos for years and love the wave rider. some of the different updates have not worked for me, but this edition is great and the shoe has good flexibility while giving enough arch support. the toe has enough room not to crunch my toes without being too boxy either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Nice cushy shoe. First time I wore them I wore them all day. My plantar fasciitis didn’t flare up at all and I didn’t get any blisters. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: No cushion
customer_reviews.text: These fit to size but have zero cushion. My ankles and arches are extremely sore after wearing them. I missed the return date by a week, otherwise I would have returned these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: normalperson

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up - runs small -
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for high arches and the Wide is good for slightly wide feet. The best shoe I have found for my feet in a very long time. Thanks Mizuno!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and was told to buy these. I love them
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I'm on my feet all day and they have really helped lessen my foot pain. Very comfortable and look good. Only con is I should have gotten a half size larger. Other than that, they have exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Great support, super well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They're very comfortable and well structured to provide a ton of support.
customer_reviews.author: Roxas

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: I love Mizuno but this incarnation of the Wave Rider did not do it for me. The toe box was significantly longer than all my other Mizunos of the same size. They just were not as comfortable either.
customer_reviews.author: FaretheeMel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable to wear. Plan to order another pair net month.
customer_reviews.author: SafetyFirst

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Bye ASICS!
customer_reviews.text: Ran these the day of a half marathon, after a few months of training in ASICS and they did not let me down. So happy with these, light weight and super supportive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best brand ever.
customer_reviews.text: The Mizuno (size 8) I ordered is perfectly fit to me. I can’t be wrong with the size I order. This is the only brand works for my feet. I work at the retail comp., and my job have to much walk around the store. I highly recommended this brand, specially if you do have a deep arch like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever! Fit great and Mizuno's last forever. Customer for life here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Mizuno Wave riders for years, and this is my 5th or 6th pair. They got as expected and are as comfortable as always.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Di Russo

customer_reviews.title: I love Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to running shoe always and forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: K3ndahl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I bought another pair because they are so comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Jil

customer_reviews.title: The same size I usually buy but got a 7 1/2 W
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of shoes but this shoe is by far the most comfortable. Well padded and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes for the bride
customer_reviews.text: Just what my bride needed to train for her next marathon!
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Brooks Ghost has always been my preferred running shoe. Thought I’d try the Mizunos! If you are a neutral as far as fit, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use for running and so far so good. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Great support, lightweight everything I want in an athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee Denison

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, fun color! I've gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about 3 weeks now and I love them for work! Great support and feels like I'm walking on a cloud! I have narrow feet with high arches and these are super comfy! I ordered my normal size in running shoes which is a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Carus

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes! They don't have to be "worn in" to feel great. I ran a 5K immediately after purchasing them and my feet felt great. I don't want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of Treadmill walking. These shoes are very comfortable and don’t make my feet burn like other sneakers do. I normally wear a size 7 shoe and ordered these in an 8. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as above
customer_reviews.text: Love this product they're one of the best shoes I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Great stuff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter, she loves them. They fit great and offer great support. Love the pretty color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Triathlete who wears these
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in mizunos for a number of years now and after an initial fitting in a store, I always purchase online. I haven't had any issues with fit doing it this way.
customer_reviews.author: John M Brausch

customer_reviews.title: ... of this style and still is the best-fitting and comfortable sneaker that I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of this style and still is the best-fitting and comfortable sneaker that I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable, well-made shoes I have ever bought. I just ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tellicon

customer_reviews.title: Similar in style to the Wave Rider 19
customer_reviews.text: It has very attractive styling. I use it for walking the neighborhood and for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stasko

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy Asics but I love Muzino now
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sheiber

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this shoe all 22 years. It’s the best fit for me and never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Mizuno Wave Riders and am so thrilled to find that they're still great! I have a narrow foot and Mizuno's have always fit me perfectly. Love these shoes - I like the gray color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Peace

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful and comfortable stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its very comfortable shoes I've been wearing over 15 years.It was great deal and looking forward to use it many activities as well.thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Varelia

customer_reviews.title: Another good shoe from Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: Well cushioned and comfortable. I've been buying Wave Riders since 2010 and these are the quality I've come to know and love in the Mizuno brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Winters

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever and the only brand that fits me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits different
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite version of the wave rider. The heel doesn’t seem to go up quite as high as my others.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Asara

product_meta.title: Mizuno Women's Wave Rider 22 Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
Wave rider 22 incorporates a 2-layered engineered mesh upper for excellent breathability and comfort. Cloud Wave cushioning technology has softened the runners experience, while maintaining a responsive ride.

Since our founding in 1906, we at Mizuno have taken special pride and pleasure in being able to participate in the exciting world of sports and in making the entire globe the stage for our activities. Each and every one of us is guided by the ideal of true sportsmanship. That was true nearly 100 years ago and is still true today. It is evident in our corporate philosophy which, simply stated, is "Contributing to society through the advancement of sporting goods and the promotion of sports." This philosophy is clearly reflected in our strong support of numerous worldwide sport events and in our dedication to advancing sports through cutting edge technology and research. Our product development strategy is to create products with features that enhance athlete performance and are unique to only Mizuno. These technological advancements make our sporting equipment and apparel go the extra mile and keep you in tip top playing form no matter the sport nor the conditions. Whether it's our Breath Thermo line of clothing which generates heat from the absorption of moisture to keep you warm in cooler temperatures, to our line of Arctic Touch garments that expels heat and moisture generated by the body during exercise to keep your body cool and comfortable, your comfort and performance are at the forefront of our innovation. From the diamond to the track, from the court to the fairway, Mizuno's commitment to Serious Performance shines through. Today, the high quality equipment that only Mizuno can produce are relied upon by athletes throughout the world. We produce superior quality equipment for serious performance, through the artful combination of technology and craftsmanship. Because, at Mizuno, your passion is our obsession.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Proven Cloudwave Platform for smooth and responsive ride
U4ic midsole with soft heel center
Engineered Stretch Mesh for adaptive Fit in Motion
Articulated Heel Zone for smoother transition
